subs.text: Early podcasts on YouTube? This is an experiment. I used an online tool to convert the MP3 for a podcast interview Chris Lydon did in July 2003, with me -- to a video, I'm not sure if they added any advertising to it, so I'm posting it here for people to listen to and get feedback on, before proceeding with the rest.
Hey the January 6 committee is using Twitter in a smart way.
